src:
Taylor Swift şi Billie Eilish, marile câştigătoare ale galei MTV Europe Music Awards
04 Nov 2019, 19:13 by Jurnal.md

Cântăreţele Taylor Swift şi Billie Eilish sunt marile câştigătoare ale galei MTV Europe Music Awards, care a avut loc duminică seară la Sevilia.

Americancele Swift şi Eilish au obţinut câte două trofee.
Taylor Swift a fost desemnată „Best U.S. act” şi s-a impus la categoria „Best video”, cu „Me!”, în timp ce Eilish a fost aleasă „Best new artist” şi a câştigat trofeul secţiunii „Best song”, cu „Bad Boy”, devansându-i pe Ariana Grande, Lil Nas X, Post Malone, Camila Cabello şi Shawn Mendes, care a fost desemnat „Best astist”, scrie News.ro.
Eilish, Swift şi Mendes nu au fost prezenţi la ceremonie pentru a-şi ridica premiile, dar au transmis mesaje de mulţumire.
Două trofee a câştigat şi grupul K-pop BTS, la categoriile „Best live performance” şi „Biggest fans”.
Pe scena galei au urcat, între alţii, Becky G, Mabel, Halsey şi Rosalía. Dua Lipa a deschis evenimentul, cu cea mai recentă piesă a ei, „Don’t Start Now”. Solistele au fost acompaniate de numeroşi dansatori şi au impresionat prin coregrafii complexe.
Liam Gallagher, care a fost recompensat cu trofeul onorific Rock Icon, a încheiat seara cu „Once”, urmată de „Wonderwall”.
Lista câştigătorilor MTV EMA 2019:
Best video: Taylor Swift, „Me!” (ft. Brendon Urie)
Best artist: Shawn Mendes
Best song: Billie Eilish, „Bad Guy”
Best collaboration: Rosalía, J Balvin, Con Altura ft. El Guincho
Best new: Billie Eilish
Best pop: Halsey
Best live: BTS
Best rock: Green Day
Best hip hop: Nicki Minaj
Best alternative: FKA Twigs
Best electronic: Martin Garrix
Best push: Ava Max
Best work, stage: Muse (Bilbao, Spania, 2018)
Biggest fans: BTS
Best U.S. act: Taylor Swift
text:
Taylor Swift and Billie Eilish, the big winners of the MTV Europe Music Awards
04 Nov 2019, 19:13 by Jurnal.md

Singers Taylor Swift and Billie Eilish are the big winners of the MTV Europe Music Awards, which took place in Seville on Sunday night.

The Americans Swift and Eilish won two trophies.
Taylor Swift was named "Best U.S. act "and won the" Best video "category, with" Me! ", while Eilish was chosen" Best new artist "and won the trophy of the" Best song "section, with" Bad Boy ", overtaking them Ariana Grande, Lil Nas X, Post Malone, Camila Cabello and Shawn Mendes, who was named "Best Astist", writes News.ro.
Eilish, Swift and Mendes were not present at the ceremony to pick up their prizes, but they sent messages of thanks.
Two trophies also won the K-pop group BTS, in the categories "Best live performance" and "Biggest fans".
On the stage of the gala were, among others, Becky G, Mabel, Halsey and Rosalía. Dua Lipa opened the event with her latest song, "Start Start Now". The soloists were accompanied by numerous dancers and impressed with the complex choreography.
Liam Gallagher, who was honored with the Rock Icon honorary trophy, ended the evening with "Once," followed by "Wonderwall."
List of winners of MTV EMA 2019:
Best video: Taylor Swift, "Me!" (Ft. Brendon Urie)
Best artist: Shawn Mendes
Best song: Billie Eilish, "Bad Guy"
Best collaboration: Rosalía, J Balvin, Con Altura ft. El Guincho
Best new: Billie Eilish
Best pop: Halsey
Best live: BTS
Best rock: Green Day
Best hip hop: Nicki Minaj
Best alternative: FKA Twigs
Best electronic: Martin Garrix
Best Push: Ava Max
Best work, stage: Muse (Bilbao, Spain, 2018)
Biggest fans: BTS
Best U.S. act: Taylor Swift
